channel.title: Projects on Suresh Kumar Gadi
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Suresh Kumar Gadi

item.title: Uyamak - A online simulation platform for the mathematical model
item.description: Status A beta version is published. UYAMAK Team Suresh Kumar Gadi

item.title: Control and Identification Toolbox (CIT)
item.description: Status A beta version of continuous time design is published. Team Suresh Kumar Gadi Antonio Concha

item.title: Modeling and control of a Force Augmenting Device (FAD)
System identification by applying frequency domain techniques on a real-time system
item.description: In this project, a system is excited at various frequencies and its response is captured to calculate an approximate transfer function for the system in real-time.

item.title: Designing Factory Floor Tester (FFT)
item.description: This project Designing a factory floor tester for a heating ventilation and air conditioning (HVAC) controller and a remote monitoring unit (RMU) is carried out by Honeywell to test its products on the production line.

item.title: Applying Artificial Intelligence algorithm, A*, to solve Puzzle-8
item.description: This is a MATLAB program to introduce the A* algorithm by solving the puzzle-8.

item.title: Character recognition using Artificial Neural Networks (ANN)
Implementation of a transducer electronic data sheet (TEDS)
Tilt measurement using a micro-electromechanical system (MEMS) accelerometer with LabVIEW
Ready box tool
item.description: A ready box is a package to be taken along with a set of equipment. This package contain tools, spare parts, etc. In an oil rig, the challenge is minimize the package size yet satisfying minimum requirements of all the equipment. This program allows user to manage a ready box.

item.title: Surface well testing (SWT)
item.description: The project, Construction of the 66 KV double circuit transmission lines at Bawana, Delhi, is contracted to L&T by Tata Power Delhi Distribution, formarly known as North Delhi Power Ltd. (NDPL), to strengthen North Delhi power distribution system. The Institution of Engineers (India) considered this project as a Bachelor’s thesis.

item.title: Construction of the 66 KV double circuit transmission lines at Bawana, Delhi
item.description: The project, Construction of the 66 KV double circuit transmission lines at Bawana, Delhi, is contracted to L&T by Tata Power Delhi Distribution, formarly known as North Delhi Power Ltd. (NDPL), to strengthen North Delhi power distribution system. The Institution of Engineers (India) considered this project as a Bachelor’s thesis.

item.title: Railway electrification project from Ludhiana to Amritsar in Punjab
item.description: The project, Railway electrification project from Ludhiana to Amritsar in Punjab, is contracted to L&T by the Indian Railways to modernize the railways in this zone.

item.title: Site management tool
item.description: This program allows user to manage a construction site. It includes inventory control, site work monitoring and material reconciliation.

item.title: Construction of the 132 KV double circuit transmission lines at Jodhpur, Rajasthan
item.description: The project, Construction of the 132 KV double circuit transmission lines at Jodhpur, Rajasthan, is contracted to L&T by Rajasthan Vidyut Prasaran Nigam Limited (RVPNL) to strengthen rajasthan electricity department.

item.title: Microprocessor based water level controller
item.description: This work is part of the thesis for obtaining the grade of Diploma in Electrical and Electronics Engineering.
